description.en:
A sporty tomboy frequently drops by to rest at the residence of Kei, an older guy who's a family and childhood friend of hers. One day, she discovers his porn stash, and is surprised to find that he has a particular taste in women…

Published in [comic anthurium 2017/05 Vol. 049](https://comic.gotbb.jp/comics/magazine/comicanthurium/comic-a-049).
___
**Additional Retail Links:**
- [DLsite](https://www.dlsite.com/books/work/=/product_id/BJ110917.html)
- [FANZA](https://book.dmm.co.jp/product/727804/b399agoar01108/)

biography.en:
**Name In Native Language:** 窓口基

**Other Romanizations:**
MADO GuchiMoto
Madoguchi Moto

**Also Known As:** mado (窓)

**Circle:** [Mukade-tou](https://mangadex.org/author/85071979-4ef3-4830-8edd-09426fd8c75c)

**Birthday:** April 13

**Trackers:**
[MyAnimeList](https://myanimelist.net/people/66496/Guchimoto_Mado)
[MangaUpdates](https://www.mangaupdates.com/author/gnoupj8/madoguchi-moto)

**Other Accounts:**
[DeviantArt](https://www.deviantart.com/rradical)
[SUZURI](https://suzuri.jp/MADOguchimoto)
[niconico](https://manga.nicovideo.jp/manga/list?user_id=123074651)
___
Not to be confused with [Tsubura Mado](https://mangadex.org/author/16c34dfb-3a41-45f7-ad1f-b0b9ab218ec8), who has gone by “MADO”.
